name: ASSOCIATION MEDICALE EUROPEENNE
goal:
Created by and for doctors, EMA is essentially a service organisation. EMA does not conflict or interfere with other existing medical associations or professional activities. To improve the quality of healthcare and medical working conditions in the European Community, EMA primarily aims to:

Improve information
Improve transparency and comparison
Encourage collaboration and mobility
euInitiatives:
MEDICAL TRAVEL

L'EMA en tant qu'association européenne accorde une grande importance à la Libre circulation médecins et patients
